sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('
SELECT DISTINCT
    CAST(A.TheFirstOfMonth AS VARCHAR(20)) + '' 00:00:00.000'' AS DT_INICIO
    ,CAST(A.TheLastOfMonth AS VARCHAR(20)) + '' 23:59:59.000'' AS DT_FIM,

     CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),A.TheFirstOfMonth  ,103)  AS DT_INICIO_ORACLE
    ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),A.TheLastOfMonth ,103)  AS DT_FIM_ORACLE

FROM calendar A
WHERE A.TheFirstOfMonth BETWEEN ','''',variables('DT_INICIO'),'''', ' AND  ','''',variables('DT_FIM'),'''')

@concat(
'DECLARE @DT_INICIO AS DATE
 DECLARE @DT_FIM     AS DATE

SET @DT_INICIO = ','''', item().DT_INICIO,'''',
'SET @DT_FIM = '  , '''', item().DT_FIM,'''',
' SELECT 
 90 as estabelecimento  ',

 '
     ,nfe_dt_emissao
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , fne_cod
    , fne_nome_fantasia
    , ine_mat_cod
    , mat_desc_resumida
    , gmm_nome
    , ine_qtde_entrada
    , mat_unm_cod_entrada
    , ine_vlr_unit_entrada
    , nfe_ipg_aberto
    , ine_vlr_desconto
    , ine_vlr_ipi
    , nfe_aft
    , nfe_vlr_total
    , ds_nfe_tipo
    , nfe_crit_venc
    , nfe_cpg_parcelas
    , nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
    , nfe_parcela_1
FROM (
    SELECT cfg.cfg_emp
        , sba.sba_cod
        , sba.sba_nome
        , nfe.nfe_serie
        , nfe.nfe_num
        , nfe.nfe_fne_cod
        , nfe.nfe_tipo
        , CASE nfe.nfe_tipo

                WHEN ''PR''
                THEN ''Entrada''
            WHEN ''SR''
                THEN ''Simples Remessa''
            WHEN ''SF''
                THEN ''Simples Faturamento''
            WHEN ''DV''
                THEN ''Devolução''
            WHEN ''TR''
                THEN ''Transferência''
            ELSE ''N/A''
            END AS ds_nfe_tipo
        , fne.fne_cod
        , fne.fne_nome_fantasia
        , nfe.nfe_vlr_total
 
 
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 i.ipg_dt_vcto
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ORDER BY i.ipg_dt_vcto
            ) AS nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
        , (
            SELECT count(ipg_parc)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ) AS nfe_cpg_parcelas
        , nfe.nfe_crit_venc
        , nfe.nfe_parcela_1
        , nfe.nfe_dt_emissao
        , nfe.nfe_dt_entrada
        , ine.ine_seq
        , ine.ine_mat_cod
        , mat.mat_desc_resumida
        , mat.mat_lma_cod
        , lma.lma_nome
        , mat.mat_gmm_cod
        , gmm.gmm_nome
        , mat_unm_cod_entrada
        , ine.ine_qtde AS ine_qtde_entrada
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit AS ine_vlr_unit_entrada
        , (
            SELECT isnull(sum(ipg_valor), 0)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
                AND i.ipg_status IN (''A'', ''R'')
                AND i.ipg_dt_vcto <= @DT_FIM
            ) AS nfe_ipg_aberto
        , mat_unm_cod_saida
        , '' AS solic
        , '' AS DATA_solic
        , convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_serie) + ''.'' + convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_num) AS nfe_aft
        , aft_dthr
        , ine.ine_qtde * mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_qtde_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit / mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_vlr_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_ipi
        , ine.ine_vlr_desconto
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_cod
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                          )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                    n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                    AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_cod
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_nome_fantasia
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                        )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                   n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                 AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_nome_fantasia
        , replace(replace(replace(emp_cgc, ''.'', ''''), ''/'', ''''), ''-'', '''') AS emp_cgc
    FROM nfe WITH (NOLOCK)
    INNER JOIN ine WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                nfe.nfe_fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND nfe.nfe_serie = ine.ine_nfe_serie
                AND nfe.nfe_num = ine.ine_nfe_num
                AND nfe.nfe_tipo = ine.ine_nfe_tipo
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN fne WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (convert(VARCHAR, ine.ine_fne_cod) = convert(VARCHAR, fne.fne_cod))
    LEFT OUTER JOIN mat WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (mat.mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lma WITH (NOLOCK)
       ON (
                lma.lma_cod = mat.mat_lma_cod
                AND lma.lma_gmm_cod = mat.mat_gmm_cod
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN gmm WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (lma.lma_gmm_cod = gmm.gmm_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN sba WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (sba.sba_cod = nfe.nfe_sba_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN aft WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
               aft_serie = ine_aft_serie
                AND aft_num = ine_aft_num
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN emp WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (emp.emp_fne_cod = fne.FNE_COD)
    CROSS JOIN cfg
    WHERE (
            nfe.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
            AND nfe.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
            )
        AND (
            fne.fne_cod IN (''%'')
            OR (''%'' IN (''%''))
            )
    ) AS t1
ORDER BY sba_cod
    , sba_nome
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , ine_seq
 '

)

@concat(
'DECLARE @DT_INICIO AS DATE
 DECLARE @DT_FIM     AS DATE

SET @DT_INICIO = ','''', item().DT_INICIO,'''',
'SET @DT_FIM = '  , '''', item().DT_FIM,'''',
' SELECT 
 91 as estabelecimento  ',

 '
     ,nfe_dt_emissao
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , fne_cod
    , fne_nome_fantasia
    , ine_mat_cod
    , mat_desc_resumida
    , gmm_nome
    , ine_qtde_entrada
    , mat_unm_cod_entrada
    , ine_vlr_unit_entrada
    , nfe_ipg_aberto
    , ine_vlr_desconto
    , ine_vlr_ipi
    , nfe_aft
    , nfe_vlr_total
    , ds_nfe_tipo
    , nfe_crit_venc
    , nfe_cpg_parcelas
    , nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
    , nfe_parcela_1
FROM (
    SELECT cfg.cfg_emp
        , sba.sba_cod
        , sba.sba_nome
        , nfe.nfe_serie
        , nfe.nfe_num
        , nfe.nfe_fne_cod
        , nfe.nfe_tipo
        , CASE nfe.nfe_tipo

                WHEN ''PR''
                THEN ''Entrada''
            WHEN ''SR''
                THEN ''Simples Remessa''
            WHEN ''SF''
                THEN ''Simples Faturamento''
            WHEN ''DV''
                THEN ''Devolução''
            WHEN ''TR''
                THEN ''Transferência''
            ELSE ''N/A''
            END AS ds_nfe_tipo
        , fne.fne_cod
        , fne.fne_nome_fantasia
        , nfe.nfe_vlr_total
 
 
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 i.ipg_dt_vcto
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ORDER BY i.ipg_dt_vcto
            ) AS nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
        , (
            SELECT count(ipg_parc)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ) AS nfe_cpg_parcelas
        , nfe.nfe_crit_venc
        , nfe.nfe_parcela_1
        , nfe.nfe_dt_emissao
        , nfe.nfe_dt_entrada
        , ine.ine_seq
        , ine.ine_mat_cod
        , mat.mat_desc_resumida
        , mat.mat_lma_cod
        , lma.lma_nome
        , mat.mat_gmm_cod
        , gmm.gmm_nome
        , mat_unm_cod_entrada
        , ine.ine_qtde AS ine_qtde_entrada
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit AS ine_vlr_unit_entrada
        , (
            SELECT isnull(sum(ipg_valor), 0)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
                AND i.ipg_status IN (''A'', ''R'')
                AND i.ipg_dt_vcto <= @DT_FIM
            ) AS nfe_ipg_aberto
        , mat_unm_cod_saida
        , '' AS solic
        , '' AS DATA_solic
        , convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_serie) + ''.'' + convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_num) AS nfe_aft
        , aft_dthr
        , ine.ine_qtde * mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_qtde_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit / mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_vlr_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_ipi
        , ine.ine_vlr_desconto
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_cod
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                          )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                    n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                    AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_cod
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_nome_fantasia
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                        )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                   n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                 AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_nome_fantasia
        , replace(replace(replace(emp_cgc, ''.'', ''''), ''/'', ''''), ''-'', '''') AS emp_cgc
    FROM nfe WITH (NOLOCK)
    INNER JOIN ine WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                nfe.nfe_fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND nfe.nfe_serie = ine.ine_nfe_serie
                AND nfe.nfe_num = ine.ine_nfe_num
                AND nfe.nfe_tipo = ine.ine_nfe_tipo
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN fne WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (convert(VARCHAR, ine.ine_fne_cod) = convert(VARCHAR, fne.fne_cod))
    LEFT OUTER JOIN mat WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (mat.mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lma WITH (NOLOCK)
       ON (
                lma.lma_cod = mat.mat_lma_cod
                AND lma.lma_gmm_cod = mat.mat_gmm_cod
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN gmm WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (lma.lma_gmm_cod = gmm.gmm_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN sba WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (sba.sba_cod = nfe.nfe_sba_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN aft WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
               aft_serie = ine_aft_serie
                AND aft_num = ine_aft_num
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN emp WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (emp.emp_fne_cod = fne.FNE_COD)
    CROSS JOIN cfg
    WHERE (
            nfe.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
            AND nfe.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
            )
        AND (
            fne.fne_cod IN (''%'')
            OR (''%'' IN (''%''))
            )
    ) AS t1
ORDER BY sba_cod
    , sba_nome
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , ine_seq
 '

)

@concat(
'DECLARE @DT_INICIO AS DATE
 DECLARE @DT_FIM     AS DATE

SET @DT_INICIO = ','''', item().DT_INICIO,'''',
'SET @DT_FIM = '  , '''', item().DT_FIM,'''',
' SELECT 
 92 as estabelecimento  ',

 '
     ,nfe_dt_emissao
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , fne_cod
    , fne_nome_fantasia
    , ine_mat_cod
    , mat_desc_resumida
    , gmm_nome
    , ine_qtde_entrada
    , mat_unm_cod_entrada
    , ine_vlr_unit_entrada
    , nfe_ipg_aberto
    , ine_vlr_desconto
    , ine_vlr_ipi
    , nfe_aft
    , nfe_vlr_total
    , ds_nfe_tipo
    , nfe_crit_venc
    , nfe_cpg_parcelas
    , nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
    , nfe_parcela_1
FROM (
    SELECT cfg.cfg_emp
        , sba.sba_cod
        , sba.sba_nome
        , nfe.nfe_serie
        , nfe.nfe_num
        , nfe.nfe_fne_cod
        , nfe.nfe_tipo
        , CASE nfe.nfe_tipo

                WHEN ''PR''
                THEN ''Entrada''
            WHEN ''SR''
                THEN ''Simples Remessa''
            WHEN ''SF''
                THEN ''Simples Faturamento''
            WHEN ''DV''
                THEN ''Devolução''
            WHEN ''TR''
                THEN ''Transferência''
            ELSE ''N/A''
            END AS ds_nfe_tipo
        , fne.fne_cod
        , fne.fne_nome_fantasia
        , nfe.nfe_vlr_total
 
 
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 i.ipg_dt_vcto
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ORDER BY i.ipg_dt_vcto
            ) AS nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
        , (
            SELECT count(ipg_parc)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ) AS nfe_cpg_parcelas
        , nfe.nfe_crit_venc
        , nfe.nfe_parcela_1
        , nfe.nfe_dt_emissao
        , nfe.nfe_dt_entrada
        , ine.ine_seq
        , ine.ine_mat_cod
        , mat.mat_desc_resumida
        , mat.mat_lma_cod
        , lma.lma_nome
        , mat.mat_gmm_cod
        , gmm.gmm_nome
        , mat_unm_cod_entrada
        , ine.ine_qtde AS ine_qtde_entrada
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit AS ine_vlr_unit_entrada
        , (
            SELECT isnull(sum(ipg_valor), 0)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
                AND i.ipg_status IN (''A'', ''R'')
                AND i.ipg_dt_vcto <= @DT_FIM
            ) AS nfe_ipg_aberto
        , mat_unm_cod_saida
        , '' AS solic
        , '' AS DATA_solic
        , convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_serie) + ''.'' + convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_num) AS nfe_aft
        , aft_dthr
        , ine.ine_qtde * mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_qtde_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit / mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_vlr_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_ipi
        , ine.ine_vlr_desconto
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_cod
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                          )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                    n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                    AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_cod
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_nome_fantasia
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                        )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                   n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                 AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_nome_fantasia
        , replace(replace(replace(emp_cgc, ''.'', ''''), ''/'', ''''), ''-'', '''') AS emp_cgc
    FROM nfe WITH (NOLOCK)
    INNER JOIN ine WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                nfe.nfe_fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND nfe.nfe_serie = ine.ine_nfe_serie
                AND nfe.nfe_num = ine.ine_nfe_num
                AND nfe.nfe_tipo = ine.ine_nfe_tipo
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN fne WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (convert(VARCHAR, ine.ine_fne_cod) = convert(VARCHAR, fne.fne_cod))
    LEFT OUTER JOIN mat WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (mat.mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lma WITH (NOLOCK)
       ON (
                lma.lma_cod = mat.mat_lma_cod
                AND lma.lma_gmm_cod = mat.mat_gmm_cod
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN gmm WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (lma.lma_gmm_cod = gmm.gmm_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN sba WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (sba.sba_cod = nfe.nfe_sba_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN aft WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
               aft_serie = ine_aft_serie
                AND aft_num = ine_aft_num
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN emp WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (emp.emp_fne_cod = fne.FNE_COD)
    CROSS JOIN cfg
    WHERE (
            nfe.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
            AND nfe.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
            )
        AND (
            fne.fne_cod IN (''%'')
            OR (''%'' IN (''%''))
            )
    ) AS t1
ORDER BY sba_cod
    , sba_nome
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , ine_seq
 '

)

@concat(
'DECLARE @DT_INICIO AS DATE
 DECLARE @DT_FIM     AS DATE

SET @DT_INICIO = ','''', item().DT_INICIO,'''',
'SET @DT_FIM = '  , '''', item().DT_FIM,'''',
' SELECT 
 93 as estabelecimento  ',

 '
     ,nfe_dt_emissao
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , fne_cod
    , fne_nome_fantasia
    , ine_mat_cod
    , mat_desc_resumida
    , gmm_nome
    , ine_qtde_entrada
    , mat_unm_cod_entrada
    , ine_vlr_unit_entrada
    , nfe_ipg_aberto
    , ine_vlr_desconto
    , ine_vlr_ipi
    , nfe_aft
    , nfe_vlr_total
    , ds_nfe_tipo
    , nfe_crit_venc
    , nfe_cpg_parcelas
    , nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
    , nfe_parcela_1
FROM (
    SELECT cfg.cfg_emp
        , sba.sba_cod
        , sba.sba_nome
        , nfe.nfe_serie
        , nfe.nfe_num
        , nfe.nfe_fne_cod
        , nfe.nfe_tipo
        , CASE nfe.nfe_tipo

                WHEN ''PR''
                THEN ''Entrada''
            WHEN ''SR''
                THEN ''Simples Remessa''
            WHEN ''SF''
                THEN ''Simples Faturamento''
            WHEN ''DV''
                THEN ''Devolução''
            WHEN ''TR''
                THEN ''Transferência''
            ELSE ''N/A''
            END AS ds_nfe_tipo
        , fne.fne_cod
        , fne.fne_nome_fantasia
        , nfe.nfe_vlr_total
 
 
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 i.ipg_dt_vcto
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ORDER BY i.ipg_dt_vcto
            ) AS nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
        , (
            SELECT count(ipg_parc)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ) AS nfe_cpg_parcelas
        , nfe.nfe_crit_venc
        , nfe.nfe_parcela_1
        , nfe.nfe_dt_emissao
        , nfe.nfe_dt_entrada
        , ine.ine_seq
        , ine.ine_mat_cod
        , mat.mat_desc_resumida
        , mat.mat_lma_cod
        , lma.lma_nome
        , mat.mat_gmm_cod
        , gmm.gmm_nome
        , mat_unm_cod_entrada
        , ine.ine_qtde AS ine_qtde_entrada
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit AS ine_vlr_unit_entrada
        , (
            SELECT isnull(sum(ipg_valor), 0)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
                AND i.ipg_status IN (''A'', ''R'')
                AND i.ipg_dt_vcto <= @DT_FIM
            ) AS nfe_ipg_aberto
        , mat_unm_cod_saida
        , '' AS solic
        , '' AS DATA_solic
        , convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_serie) + ''.'' + convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_num) AS nfe_aft
        , aft_dthr
        , ine.ine_qtde * mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_qtde_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit / mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_vlr_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_ipi
        , ine.ine_vlr_desconto
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_cod
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                          )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                    n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                    AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_cod
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_nome_fantasia
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                        )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                   n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                 AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_nome_fantasia
        , replace(replace(replace(emp_cgc, ''.'', ''''), ''/'', ''''), ''-'', '''') AS emp_cgc
    FROM nfe WITH (NOLOCK)
    INNER JOIN ine WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                nfe.nfe_fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND nfe.nfe_serie = ine.ine_nfe_serie
                AND nfe.nfe_num = ine.ine_nfe_num
                AND nfe.nfe_tipo = ine.ine_nfe_tipo
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN fne WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (convert(VARCHAR, ine.ine_fne_cod) = convert(VARCHAR, fne.fne_cod))
    LEFT OUTER JOIN mat WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (mat.mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lma WITH (NOLOCK)
       ON (
                lma.lma_cod = mat.mat_lma_cod
                AND lma.lma_gmm_cod = mat.mat_gmm_cod
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN gmm WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (lma.lma_gmm_cod = gmm.gmm_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN sba WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (sba.sba_cod = nfe.nfe_sba_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN aft WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
               aft_serie = ine_aft_serie
                AND aft_num = ine_aft_num
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN emp WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (emp.emp_fne_cod = fne.FNE_COD)
    CROSS JOIN cfg
    WHERE (
            nfe.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
            AND nfe.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
            )
        AND (
            fne.fne_cod IN (''%'')
            OR (''%'' IN (''%''))
            )
    ) AS t1
ORDER BY sba_cod
    , sba_nome
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , ine_seq
 '

)

@concat(
'DECLARE @DT_INICIO AS DATE
 DECLARE @DT_FIM     AS DATE

SET @DT_INICIO = ','''', item().DT_INICIO,'''',
'SET @DT_FIM = '  , '''', item().DT_FIM,'''',
' SELECT 
 94 as estabelecimento  ',

 '

    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , fne_cod
    , fne_nome_fantasia
    , ine_mat_cod

    , ine_qtde_entrada
    , mat_unm_cod_entrada
    , ine_vlr_unit_entrada
    , nfe_ipg_aberto
    , ine_vlr_desconto
    , ine_vlr_ipi

        , nfe.nfe_tipo
        , CASE nfe.nfe_tipo

                WHEN ''PR''
                THEN ''Entrada''
            WHEN ''SR''
                THEN ''Simples Remessa''
            WHEN ''SF''
                THEN ''Simples Faturamento''
            WHEN ''DV''

        , (

            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (

                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num

            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie

            ) AS nfe_cpg_parcelas
        , nfe.nfe_crit_venc
        , nfe.nfe_parcela_1
        , nfe.nfe_dt_emissao
        , nfe.nfe_dt_entrada
        , ine.ine_seq
        , ine.ine_mat_cod
        , mat.mat_desc_resumida
        , mat.mat_lma_cod
        , lma.lma_nome
        , mat.mat_gmm_cod
        , gmm.gmm_nome
        , mat_unm_cod_entrada
        , ine.ine_qtde AS ine_qtde_entrada
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit AS ine_vlr_unit_entrada
        , (
            SELECT isnull(sum(ipg_valor), 0)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (

                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num

            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie

        , mat_unm_cod_saida
        , '' AS solic

        , convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_serie) + ''.'' + convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_num) AS nfe_aft
        , aft_dthr

        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_cod
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie

            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod

                AND (
                   n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                 AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC

                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN fne WITH (NOLOCK)

    LEFT OUTER JOIN mat WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (mat.mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lma WITH (NOLOCK)
       ON (

                AND lma.lma_gmm_cod = mat.mat_gmm_cod
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN gmm WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (lma.lma_gmm_cod = gmm.gmm_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN sba WITH (NOLOCK)

               aft_serie = ine_aft_serie
                AND aft_num = ine_aft_num
                )

        ON (emp.emp_fne_cod = fne.FNE_COD)
    CROSS JOIN cfg
    WHERE (

            )
    ) AS t1
ORDER BY sba_cod
    , sba_nome
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , ine_seq
 '

)

oracleReaderQuery.value:
@concat(

'with cate as(
select  
        A.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO,
        obter_nome_estab(a.cd_estabelecimento) ds_estabelecimento,
        A.NR_ORDEM_COMPRA,
        a.dt_entrada_saida,
        a.dt_emissao,
        a.nr_nota_fiscal,
        a.cd_cgc_emitente,
        substr(obter_nome_pf_pj(null,a.cd_cgc_emitente),1,100) ds_fornecedor,
        pj.CD_CEP,
        pj.DS_ENDERECO,
        pj.DS_BAIRRO,
        pj.DS_MUNICIPIO,
        pj.SG_ESTADO,
        b.cd_material,
        substr(obter_desc_material(b.cd_material),1,100) ds_material,
        e.ds_grupo_material,
        b.cd_local_estoque,
        b.qt_item_nf,
        b.cd_unidade_medida_compra,
        b.vl_unitario_item_nf,
        b.vl_total_item_nf, 
        b.vl_frete / b.qt_item_nf vl_frete,
        d.vl_tributo / b.qt_item_nf tributo,
        dividir(b.vl_liquido, b.qt_item_estoque) vl_custo_medio,
        ((dividir(b.vl_liquido, b.qt_item_estoque)) *(b.qt_item_nf))total_item,
        obter_desc_operacao_nota(a.CD_OPERACAO_NF) operacao
       -- ,obter_desc_local_estoque(b.CD_LOCAL_ESTOQUE) ds_local_estoque
from    nota_fiscal a,
        nota_fiscal_item b,
        estrutura_material_v e,
        nota_fiscal_item_trib d,
        pessoa_juridica pj
where   b.nr_sequencia = d.nr_sequencia (+)
        and b.nr_item_nf = d.nr_item_nf (+)
        and a.nr_sequencia = b.nr_sequencia
        and b.cd_material = e.cd_material
        and trunc(a.dt_entrada_saida,''mm'') between to_date(',
		
		'''', item().DT_INICIO_ORACLE, '''',
		
		
		
		',''DD/MM/YYYY'') and to_date(',
                
                '''', item().DT_FIM_ORACLE, '''',
                
                ',''DD/MM/YYYY'')
        and a.ie_situacao = 1
        and a.ie_tipo_nota in (''EF'',''EN'')
        and a.CD_OPERACAO_NF <> 5
        and a.dt_atualizacao_estoque is not null
        and pj.cd_cgc = a.CD_CGC_EMITENTE (+)
        --and ((a.cd_estabelecimento = :estab) or (:estab = 0))
order by dt_entrada_saida,
        nr_nota_fiscal,
        ds_fornecedor,  
        ds_material
)  
SELECT
     2 AS ESTABELECIMENTO
,A.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
,A.DS_ESTABELECIMENTO    
,OC.DT_ORDEM_COMPRA
,A.NR_ORDEM_COMPRA
,A.DT_ENTRADA_SAIDA
,A.DT_EMISSAO
,A.NR_NOTA_FISCAL
,A.CD_CGC_EMITENTE
,A.DS_FORNECEDOR
,A.CD_CEP
,A.DS_ENDERECO
,A.DS_BAIRRO
,A.DS_MUNICIPIO
,A.SG_ESTADO
,A.CD_MATERIAL
,A.DS_MATERIAL
,A.DS_GRUPO_MATERIAL
,A.CD_LOCAL_ESTOQUE
,A.QT_ITEM_NF
,A.CD_UNIDADE_MEDIDA_COMPRA
,A.VL_UNITARIO_ITEM_NF
,A.VL_TOTAL_ITEM_NF
,A.VL_FRETE
,A.TRIBUTO
,A.VL_CUSTO_MEDIO
,A.TOTAL_ITEM
,A.OPERACAO
,L.DS_LOCAL_ESTOQUE
FROM CATE A
LEFT JOIN ORDEM_COMPRA OC ON OC.NR_ORDEM_COMPRA = A.NR_ORDEM_COMPRA
LEFT JOIN LOCAL_ESTOQUE L ON L.CD_LOCAL_ESTOQUE = A.CD_LOCAL_ESTOQUE'

)

@CONCAT(

'with cate as(
select  
        A.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO,
        FAST_OPS.obter_nome_estab(a.cd_estabelecimento) ds_estabelecimento,
        A.NR_ORDEM_COMPRA,
        a.dt_entrada_saida,
        a.dt_emissao,
        a.nr_nota_fiscal,
        a.cd_cgc_emitente,
        substr(FAST_OPS.obter_nome_pf_pj(null,a.cd_cgc_emitente),1,100) ds_fornecedor,
        pj.CD_CEP,
        pj.DS_ENDERECO,
        pj.DS_BAIRRO,
        pj.DS_MUNICIPIO,
        pj.SG_ESTADO,
        b.cd_material,
        substr(FAST_OPS.obter_desc_material(b.cd_material),1,100) ds_material,
        e.ds_grupo_material,
        b.cd_local_estoque,
        b.qt_item_nf,
        b.cd_unidade_medida_compra,
        b.vl_unitario_item_nf,
        b.vl_total_item_nf, 
        b.vl_frete / b.qt_item_nf vl_frete,
        d.vl_tributo / b.qt_item_nf tributo,
        FAST_OPS.dividir(b.vl_liquido, b.qt_item_estoque) vl_custo_medio,
        ((FAST_OPS.dividir(b.vl_liquido, b.qt_item_estoque)) *(b.qt_item_nf))total_item,
        FAST_OPS.obter_desc_operacao_nota(a.CD_OPERACAO_NF) operacao
       -- ,obter_desc_local_estoque(b.CD_LOCAL_ESTOQUE) ds_local_estoque
from    FAST_OPS.nota_fiscal a,
        FAST_OPS.nota_fiscal_item b,
        FAST_OPS.estrutura_material_v e,
        FAST_OPS.nota_fiscal_item_trib d,
        FAST_OPS.pessoa_juridica pj
where   b.nr_sequencia = d.nr_sequencia (+)
        and b.nr_item_nf = d.nr_item_nf (+)
        and a.nr_sequencia = b.nr_sequencia
        and b.cd_material = e.cd_material
        and trunc(a.dt_entrada_saida,''mm'') between to_date(',
		
		'''', item().DT_INICIO_ORACLE, '''',

		',''DD/MM/YYYY'') and to_date(',
		
		'''', item().DT_FIM_ORACLE, '''',
		
		',''DD/MM/YYYY'')
        and a.ie_situacao = 1
        and a.ie_tipo_nota in (''EF'',''EN'')
        and a.CD_OPERACAO_NF <> 5
        and a.dt_atualizacao_estoque is not null
        and pj.cd_cgc = a.CD_CGC_EMITENTE (+)
        --and ((a.cd_estabelecimento = :estab) or (:estab = 0))
order by dt_entrada_saida,
        nr_nota_fiscal,
        ds_fornecedor,  
        ds_material
)  
SELECT
1 AS ESTABELECIMENTO
,A.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
,A.DS_ESTABELECIMENTO    
,OC.DT_ORDEM_COMPRA
,A.NR_ORDEM_COMPRA
,A.DT_ENTRADA_SAIDA
,A.DT_EMISSAO
,A.NR_NOTA_FISCAL
,A.CD_CGC_EMITENTE
,A.DS_FORNECEDOR
,A.CD_CEP
,A.DS_ENDERECO
,A.DS_BAIRRO
,A.DS_MUNICIPIO
,A.SG_ESTADO
,A.CD_MATERIAL
,A.DS_MATERIAL
,A.DS_GRUPO_MATERIAL
,A.CD_LOCAL_ESTOQUE
,A.QT_ITEM_NF
,A.CD_UNIDADE_MEDIDA_COMPRA
,A.VL_UNITARIO_ITEM_NF
,A.VL_TOTAL_ITEM_NF
,A.VL_FRETE
,A.TRIBUTO
,A.VL_CUSTO_MEDIO
,A.TOTAL_ITEM
,A.OPERACAO
,L.DS_LOCAL_ESTOQUE
FROM CATE A
LEFT JOIN FAST_OPS.ORDEM_COMPRA OC ON OC.NR_ORDEM_COMPRA = A.NR_ORDEM_COMPRA
LEFT JOIN FAST_OPS.LOCAL_ESTOQUE L ON L.CD_LOCAL_ESTOQUE = A.CD_LOCAL_ESTOQUE'

)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	CASE 
		WHEN day(getdate()) <= 8 THEN
			concat(substring(convert(varchar(30),DATEADD(MONTH,-1,getdate()),120),1,8),'01')
		WHEN day(getdate()) > 8 THEN
			Substring(convert(varchar(30),dateadd(day,1,EOMONTH(getdate(),-1))),1,10)
	END as Data_Inicial,

		substring(convert(varchar(30),DATEADD(day,-1,getdate()),120),1,10) as 'data_final' ,
	CASE
		WHEN day(getdate()) <= 8 THEN
			concat(substring(convert(varchar(30),DATEADD(MONTH,-1,getdate()),103),1,8),'01')
	WHEN day(getdate()) > 8 THEN
			Substring(convert(varchar(30),dateadd(day,1,EOMONTH(getdate(),-1)),103),1,10)
	END as Data_Inicial_Oracle,
        substring(convert(varchar(30),DATEADD(day,-1,getdate()),103),1,10) as 'data_final_Oracle'
